name: Adventures of Tronic (C64)
description:
A Game for TheC64Maxi/C64Mini/Commodore 64 or a Good C64 Emulator.

Help "Tronic" save Geenie Land from the Evil BadBots, Run for it and use your Power First to knock out the BadBots and look out for Spikes as that is a no go for Tronic, Pick up Rings for Bonus Points, 1 Player Game.

A Game made for Kid's but anyone can play it, It's a bit on the easy side (ish).

Made with the side ways Shoot 'Em' Up Construction Kit by Sensible Software and Jon Wells.

Made and Works on Pal C64.
